Package com.composum.pages.commons.model

Class ContentModel<ParentModel extends ContentDriven>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.composum.pages.commons.model.AbstractModel
      • com.composum.pages.commons.model.ContentModel<ParentModel>
  • Type Parameters:
    ParentModel - the model class of the parent resource
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model, com.composum.sling.core.SlingBean
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileResource, PageContent, SiteConfiguration
    public abstract class ContentModel<ParentModel extends ContentDriven>
extends AbstractModel
    the abstract base class for all 'jcr:content' child element model implementations such a resource is almost the versioned part of an element in the Pages content
